data.message: Oooooo that's a tough one! Has to be either saturday the 1st July for green day or saturday the 8th July for the killers! Never got chance to see either of them live before. Would be awesome to make some memories with them :-) always had a blast at BST but have not been able to attend the last couple of years due to my old job.  And would be a great way to celebrate the start of my new job and the start of my apprenticeship!
